doubleSpeak.sentence: Let's expand out and see a 30,000 foot view

doubleSpeak.definition: Undertake an impossible or impractical task
doubleSpeak.sentence: Let's not try to boil the ocean hear, why don't we dismantle the problem brick by brick
Why don't we circle back to this? I have to go try to boil the ocean.
We did a deep dive into the 30,000 foot view of the project
How can we drill down further into the color of the button?
Please stop flogging a dead horse and move on to an alive horse.
They changed the goal posts and now I can't hit target
Go ahead and go for the low hanging fruit, then we will figure out the big picture.
Can you please put the deep dive on your radar so we can circle back?
Please table this conversation so we can move onto the synergy.

doubleSpeak.definition: To meet up with a colleague to discuss progress (from baseball)
doubleSpeak.sentence: My manager wants to circle back and touch base offline.
